plot: A man is tortured both mentally and physically by his television. As the man is suffering, the television plays commercials representing his life, both past and present.
title: Demons of Bars and Tone
plot_es: A man is tortured both mentally and physically by his television. As the man is suffering, the television plays commercials representing his life, both past and present.
plot_en: A man is tortured both mentally and physically by his television. As the man is suffering, the television plays commercials representing his life, both past and present.
